index.html.title: Authentic Filipino Cuisine in Toronto
index.html.subtitle: A taste of Pampanga — the Culinary Capital of the Philippines.
index.html.content: Experience Kamayan feasts, sizzling platters, and homestyle Kapampangan dishes crafted fresh every day.

index.html.title: Welcome to Kabalen Toronto
index.html.content: Experience traditional Filipino dishes, Kamayan feasts, and homestyle Kapampangan flavors. Our menu is crafted from family recipes passed down for generations.

index.html.title: Book a Table
index.html.content: Reserve your Kamayan feast or family dinner with our online reservation form.

menu.html.title: Chef Specials
menu.html.content: Seasonal dishes sourced from local markets, featuring grilled seafood and sizzling platters.

menu.html.title: Classic Favorites
menu.html.content: Enjoy adobo, kare-kare, sisig, and more timeless Filipino favorites, made from scratch daily.

specials.html.title: Today’s Feature
specials.html.content: Ask about our rotating turo-turo trays packed with freshly prepared viands and desserts.

gallery.html.title: Kamayan Feast Highlights
gallery.html.content: Feast with friends and family — no utensils required for this communal dining experience.

about.html.title: Our Story
about.html.content: Kabalen brings Pampanga’s culinary heritage to Bathurst & Wilson, celebrating Filipino hospitality.

contact.html.title: Visit Us
contact.html.content: We’re open daily with extended weekend hours for Kamayan dinners and private celebrations.
